title: Episode #51: Dealing with Guilt as a Parent
description:
I'm a mom of four and I know guilt is a real issue when it comes to parenting. Especially if you are a working mom or dad. 
So how do we deal with this parent guilt? 
In this episode I discuss some tips I have used in my own life to find freedom from parent guilt.
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
